feed.title: ZITNIK LAB
feed.subtitle: Artificial Intelligence for Medicine and Science

entry.title: Molecular Interaction Networks
entry.content: A new preprint on a graph neural network approach for the prediction of molecular interactions, including drug-drug, drug-target, protein-protein, and gene-disease interactions.
entry.summary: A new preprint on a graph neural network approach for the prediction of molecular interactions, including drug-drug, drug-target, protein-protein, and gene-disease interactions.

entry.title: Submit to PhD Forum at ECML

link.title: Submit to PhD Forum at ECML

entry.content: The call for ECML-PKDD 2020 PhD Forum Track is now online. If you are a PhD student, submit your work on machine learning and knowledge discovery.
entry.summary: The call for ECML-PKDD 2020 PhD Forum Track is now online. If you are a PhD student, submit your work on machine learning and knowledge discovery.

entry.title: Drug repurposing for COVID-19
entry.content: We are excited to share our latest results on how networks and graph machine-learning help us search for a cure for COVID-19.
entry.summary: We are excited to share our latest results on how networks and graph machine-learning help us search for a cure for COVID-19.

entry.title: AI Cures
entry.content: We are joining AI Cures initiative at MIT! We will develop machine learning methods for finding promising antiviral molecules for COVID-19 and other emerging pathogens.
entry.summary: We are joining AI Cures initiative at MIT! We will develop machine learning methods for finding promising antiviral molecules for COVID-19 and other emerging pathogens.

entry.title: COVID-19 Task Force
entry.content: We are excited to be working with László Barabási and his amazing team of scientists as we search for a cure for COVID-19.
entry.summary: We are excited to be working with László Barabási and his amazing team of scientists as we search for a cure for COVID-19.

entry.title: Graph ML workshop at ICML 2020
entry.content: We will co-organize a workshop on Graph Representation Learning and Beyond at ICML 2020. Submit your finest work!
entry.summary: We will co-organize a workshop on Graph Representation Learning and Beyond at ICML 2020. Submit your finest work!

entry.title: Accepted tutorial at IJCAI!
entry.content: We will present a tutorial on Machine Learning for Drug Development at IJCAI 2020! Stay tuned for details.
entry.summary: We will present a tutorial on Machine Learning for Drug Development at IJCAI 2020! Stay tuned for details.

entry.title: Welcome new students!
entry.content: Haoxin, Michelle, and Xiang joined the lab. Welcome! We look forward to seeing you all in the lab!
entry.summary: Haoxin, Michelle, and Xiang joined the lab. Welcome! We look forward to seeing you all in the lab!

entry.title: Meta learing for single-cell biology
entry.content: A new preprint on meta learning for identifying and naming cell types, even cell types that have never been seen before and do not exist in the training data. Check it out!
entry.summary: A new preprint on meta learning for identifying and naming cell types, even cell types that have never been seen before and do not exist in the training data. Check it out!

entry.title: Pre-training graph neural networks
entry.content: Strategies for pre-training graph neural networks accepted as a spotlight paper at ICLR 2020.
entry.summary: Strategies for pre-training graph neural networks accepted as a spotlight paper at ICLR 2020.
